item.title: Serving the Lord
item.description:
Serving the Lord by Elder Adhemar Damiani, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 169th Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1999
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Adhemar Damiani, Of the Seventy

item.title: Be of Good Cheer and Faithful in Adversity
item.description:
Be of Good Cheer and Faithful in Adversity by Elder Adhemar Damiani, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 175th Annual General Conference on Thu Mar 31 2005
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
